General.Name: Digital Network S.A.
General.Description: Digital Network SA, together with its subsidiaries, engages in media and advertising business in Poland and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Digital Out-of-Home, Digital Content, and B2B Marketing Services. It provides digital advertising, advertisements broadcasting, and consulting services to broadcasters of thematic channels. The company also operates internet portals; and provides digital content created by naEkranie.pl website. In addition, it engages in the distribution of thematic TV channels and pay TV market research, as well as marketing and promotional activities for clients. The company was formerly known as 4fun Media S.A. and changed its name to Digital Network SA in April 2022. Digital Network SA was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Warsaw, Poland. Digital Network SA is a subsidiary of Epicom Ltd.
